InstallationÂ¶

  1. Clone the repository and enter it:

    `sh $ git clone https://github.com/npeleg/brain_freeze.git ... $ cd brain_freeze/ `

  2. Run the installation script and activate the virtual environment:

    `sh $ ./scripts/install.sh ... $ source .env/bin/activate [brain_freeze] $ # that's it! `

  3. To check that everything is working as expected, run the tests:

    `sh $ pytest tests/ ... `
